required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of RC48-ADC in Subjects With HER2-Positive Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study to Evaluate the Safety,Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of RC48-ADC for Injection in Subjects With Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors With HER2-positive

brief_summary.textblock: A Phase I Study to Evaluate the Safety,Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of RC48-ADC for Injection in Subjects With Advanced Malignant Solid Tumors With HER2-positive

primary_outcome.time_frame: DLT will be evaluated on 28 days of observation period
primary_outcome.description: Maximum-tolerated dose (MTD) was defined as the highest dose level at which no more than one of six patients experienced DLT during the DLT assessment window.
The drug safety was assessed by investigator(s) according to NCI-CTCAE v4.0

arm_group.description: Participants will be allocated to one of the following dose groups: 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0 and 2.5 mg/kg, and receive a treatment of RC48-ADC followed by 28 days of dose limited toxicity (DLT) observation period.

overall_official.affiliation: Cancer Institute and Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

facility.name: Cancer Hospital Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
